summary: This mod adds the human version Castle Orlok - an immense and carefully furnished player owned castle to the south and overlooking the town of Falkreath. This mod is the official human version of the Castle Orlok mod for vampires.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Castle Orlok - an immense and carefully furnished player owned castle to the south of Falkreath. It can be reached via the Map Marker, or by taking the route past Angi\'s camp. This mod is the official human version of the Castle Orlok mod, which was originally made to be a vampire castle.

[color=yellow][heading]GOOD TO KNOW[/heading]

* This mod requires the Dawnguard DLC to function.

* The front grate of the castle is raised from inside the exterior Guard tower (next to which the carriage is parked)

* Tricky Pullbar/chain locations: For Foyer and Library grates: in the Foyer (next to the fireplace). Just for foyer grate: in the corridor, to the left of the foyer: Just for library grates: In the library (hidden left of the fireplace), and in the corridor, to the right of the foyer.

* The basement is accessed from the main hall / library.

[/color]

[color=green][heading]WHAT WE HAVE SO FAR[/heading]

[b]First floor[/b]
[list][*] Entry Foyer,
[*] Main Hall / Library,
[*] Dining Room,
[*] Kitchen,
[*] Pantry,
[*] Servant quarters,
[*] Armory (7 Mannequins, 6 Display Cases, 6 Dagger Display Cases),
[*] Salon,
[*] Laboratory,
[*] Chapel to the Nine Divines, Priest\'s quarters, Lecture hall, Embalment room,
[*] NPCs: Conrad Corvanius, Carmen, Mina (courtiers), Aquintias (priest), Imperial courier, Sebastian (court mage and magic vendor), Adello (cook), Servants, Guards[/list]

[b]Basement[/b](accessible via the secret fireplace entrance from the library)
[list][*] Interior garden (equipped with laboratory),
[*] Smithy, (along with a smelter, workbench and weapon sharpening wheel),
[*] Treasury (safe storage in the safe),
[*] Guard barracks,
[*] Underground bathing chamber,
[*] Dressing room,
[*] Igor\'s quarters,
[*] NPCs: Igor (arms and armor vendor), Venlen (apothecary vendor), Guard Captain Julius, Guards[/list]

[b]Upper Floor[/b]
[list][*] Master bedroom (fireplace leads to connection with throne room and escape route),
[*] Guest bedroom,
[*] Follower bedroom,
[*] Storage space (room for future updates),
[*] Escape route
[*] NPCs: Guards, Servants[/list]

[b]Tower and Throne Room[/b] (reachable from the Upper floor)
[list][*] Open space - Throne room, Study, Enchanter, Alchemy Lab,
[*] Access to balcony with an epic view of Skyrim and the Jerall mountains
[*] Trone (with correct sitting animation)
[*] Council Table
[*] Secret passage connecting Throne room with Master bedroom and Escape route
[*] NPCs: Marius (Steward), Lucia, Amelia, Adrian, Alegra (courtiers), Guards, Servants[/list]

[b]Catacombs[/b]
[list][*] Tombs and main chamber for backstory
[*] In the main chamber - Orloggsbane (an unique akaviri sword, similar to the one that Dexion carries.)[/list]

[b]Exterior Guard Tower and Barracks[/b]
[list][*] Guard tower with pull chain for front gate,
[*] NPCs: Guard[/list]

[b]Misc[/b]
[list][*] Completely NavMeshed (follower friendly),
[*] Amazing location,
[*] The escape route brings the player to an unmarked location near falkreath,
[*] There be easter eggs[/list]
[/color]

[heading]Update Log[/heading]

-Version 1.0

[heading][/heading]
[color=yellow] Thank you for downloading the mod. If you have any ideas, feel free to share them in the comment section. I will try to make them work as well as I can. Also, if you see any irregularities, bugs, or leftovers from the vampire version, that I missed, please let me know. :)[/color]
author: Rajti15
